name: Get Combined Case History
description:
Retrieves combined case history data including:
- All case history items
- Current status of first 'In Progress' case
- Status history for selected case
- Selected case ID

name: Get PDF Contents List (JSON)
description:
Retrieves PDF document metadata and content as JSON for a specific case ID including:
- Document names, types, and metadata
- Text content of documents
- Upload information

Replace 'SCT-2024-001' with desired case ID

name: Download PDF - Application Form
description:
Downloads Security Clearance Application Form as PDF file.
URL format: /pdf-download/{caseId}/{documentId}
- caseId: SCT-2024-001
- documentId: 1 (Application Form)

Browser will download the PDF file directly.

name: Download PDF - Investigation Report
description:
Downloads Background Investigation Report as PDF file.
URL format: /pdf-download/{caseId}/{documentId}
- caseId: SCT-2024-001
- documentId: 2 (Investigation Report)

Browser will download the PDF file directly.

name: Download PDF - Interview Transcript
description:
Downloads Security Interview Transcript as PDF file.
URL format: /pdf-download/{caseId}/{documentId}
- caseId: SCT-2024-001
- documentId: 3 (Interview Transcript)

Browser will download the PDF file directly.

name: Download PDF - Medical Certificate
description:
Downloads Medical Clearance Certificate as PDF file.
URL format: /pdf-download/{caseId}/{documentId}
- caseId: SCT-2024-001
- documentId: 4 (Medical Certificate)

Browser will download the PDF file directly.
